title: 90-Year-Old Man Gives Out Tips To Combat Loneliness — Tips To Avoid Being Lonely
text:
He might be 90 years old and missing his wife and sister after their passing, but that's not stopping Derek Taylor from staying active in his community to help fight the loneliness he often feels because of his age.
After Taylor wanted to stop feeling lonely because he didn't have anyone to talk to on a daily basis, he came up with a list of tips to combat loneliness that other elderly people like himself can try in order to continue living life to the fullest.
 "I thought, what can I do to stop being lonely?" Taylor said in an interview with BBC . "The older you get, the less people seem to contact you."
It's a sad fact that comes with age that people often question: "What will I do when I'm older when I have no family and friends left?" With Taylor's list of advice, he hopes that others his age will be inspired to continue participating in some of the activities so that they don't feel lonely.
